name: Top Down Car - Physics Demo
description:
I had this side project which has now been stagnant for a long time, I just wanted to release this demo because I think it's kinda fun to drive around.

Controls - Keyboard:

  • Steering - Arrow keys/ A & D
  • Accelerating - Arrow up / W
  • Braking - Arrow Down / S
  • Handbrake - Space
  • Go back to menu - ESC

Controls - Controller:

  • Steering - Left stick
  • Acceleration - Right Trigger
  • Brake - Left Trigger
  • Handbrake - X

Have fun!
